A data product is published by a user with data product owner role

The aerOS continuum has a catalog that is composed of catalogs of each of the aerOS domains in the continuum
A data product has a name and a description
A catalog contains data products, data services, and business glossaries or controlled vocabularies
A data product might be produced with an RML mapping
